name: Yauzeras
overview: It is the year 6891 and the planet BS11 has been under the control of the Yauzeras tower for centuries. Our hero, Flavius, is the last surviving warrior of the resistance. He will have to destroy the tower and its core to save the planet. But will this alone be enough? It is said that a huge alien force lurks at the top of Yauzeras' mile-long tower, commanding both Yauzeras and his guardians. Flavius, you are the last hope to save the planet!
